faqs.application_process: The application process involves submitting an online form, required documents, and paying the application fee. You'll receive a confirmation email once submitted.
faqs.visa_requirements: International students need to provide proof of financial support, acceptance letter, and valid passport to apply for a student visa.
faqs.housing_options: We offer on-campus dormitories and can provide information about off-campus housing options.
faqs.contact: You can reach the admissions office at admissions@university.edu or call +1 (555) 123-4567.
faqs.upload_help: You can upload documents through our portal after creating an account. Accepted formats are PDF, JPG, and PNG.
